text: Sphingomonas soli is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and rod-shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil from a ginseng field in Korea.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen Sphingomonas soli produces beta-glucosidase. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas soli at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase soli Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Sphingomonas soli
